participant_1.background:
I'm a social media enthusiast looking to learn how to use it to grow my business.
I'd brag about how good my cake baking skills are.
I am most proud of my ability to take care of myself and Gila, even though I grew up without parents.
I prefer to live alone, enjoying the freedom to watch my foreign films without interruption.
i enjoy putting alcohol in my coffee.

participant_2.background:
I'm not the best at keeping up with my chores, but I try to do my laundry once a week.
My first cup of coffee in the morning inspires me to write and create content for my blog.
i have 5 children.
my favorite book is david copperfield.
My home is my sanctuary, a place where I can relax and be myself.

content.text: Sara, nice to meet you! My name is Gila.
What do you do for a living, Gila?
I run a small bakery, and I also do some social media marketing for other businesses.
Oh, that's cool! I love to bake, but I don't have the time to do it very often.
I know what you mean. It's a lot of work, but it's also very rewarding.
What's your favorite thing to bake?
I love to make cakes! I'm pretty good at it, too.
I bet you are! I've always wanted to learn how to make a good cake.
It's not that hard, you just have to follow the recipe and be patient.
Well, maybe I'll give it a try sometime.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
I'll let you know how it goes.
